fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Copyright, collective management of copyright, Intellectual property, media, competition, single digital market.
organisation_name: Copyright and Communication Consulting Agency/ Latvian Authors Association (AKKA/LAA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
International Confederation of Societies of Authors and Composers (CISAC) http://www.cisac.org/ 
 
European Grouping of Societies of Authors and Composers 
(GESAC) http://www.authorsocieties.eu/
goals__remit:
AKKA/LAA is a Latvian multi-repertory copyrights management organization representing musical, literary, dramatic, visual and audiovisual repertoires. 
The society is a nongovernmental organization. 
AKKA/LAA licenses copyright, collect and distributes royalties to rights owners and protects their copyright in Latvia. 
AKKA/LAA is a member of the International Confederation of Societies of Authors and Composers (CISAC) and the European Grouping of Societies of Authors and Composers (GESAC).
industry_forums: AKKA/LAA is a member of European umbrella organisation of collective management organisations - GESAC, which actively participates in industry forums and represents EU collective management organisations in EU institutions.
